Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Establishes the fentanyl and xylazine test strip program
Summary: Provides free fentanyl test strips to individuals at specified distribution facilities; requires a public awareness campaign on the dangers of fentanyl and the provision of the test strips.
LawCode: Add ยง19.46, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing the fentanyl test strip program
